title: MultiSSL - Self/Semi-Supervised Learning for Multispectral UAV Imagery
creator: ICAERUS / Jurrian Doornbos (jurriandoornbos)
description: MultiSSL is a library for self-supervised and semi-supervised representation learning on multispectral and RGB UAV imagery. It provides pretrained backbones, data loaders and utilities to train FastSiam-like methods, build segmentation models and reconstruct orthomosaic predictions from tiled inferences.
